definition: a garment or part of a garment designed for or relating to trousers, otherwise known as pants
details:
noun
- a garment or part of a garment designed for or relating to trousers, otherwise known as pants
= example: a garment or part of a garment designed for or relating to trousers, otherwise known as pants
- a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
= example: a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
= synonyms: pant
